Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to grant real property tax exemptions to owners of property for the cost of removing graffiti.
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature to grant real property tax exemptions to owners of property for the cost of removing graffiti.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to imposing a fine against the owners of commercial buildings and residential buildings of six or more units who do not remove graffiti from their premises, and in relation to allowing the city to clean graffiti from these buildings without the consent of the owner of the property.
Items.MatterName: Imposing a fine against the owners of commercial buildings and residential buildings of six or more units who do not remove graffiti from their premises.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to imposing a fine against the owners of commercial buildings and residential buildings of six or more units who do not remove graffiti from their premises, and in relation to allowing the city to clean graffiti from these buildings without the consent of the owner of the property.
Items.MatterName: Imposing a fine against the owners of commercial buildings and residential buildings of six or more units who do not remove graffiti from their premises.
